data.name: Rhino
data.description: Big, strong, and tough, the Rhino is a heavy hitter. Blinding him will only make him mad.

starItems.name: Rhino
starItems.description: Big, strong, and tough, the Rhino is a heavy hitter. Blinding him will only make him mad.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

1.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and each adjacent ally.
Attack primary and all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and each adjacent ally.
Attack primary and all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:

Attack primary and all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and each adjacent ally.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

Attack primary and all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and each adjacent ally.
Attack primary and all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and each adjacent ally.
Attack primary and all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>75%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>75%</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>75%</color>.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self and each ally, then fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self and each ally, then fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>25%</color>
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color> cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self and each ally, then fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>75%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color> cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self and each ally, then fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>75%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color> cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>25%</color>
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self and each ally, then fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color> cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
